conbody.p: Hadoop FS destinationwriting to Azure HDInsightAzure HDInsightusing the Hadoop FS destinationYou can use the HDP 2.4 stage library to write to Azure Blob storage using the WASB protocol. This enables the Hadoop FS destination to write directly to Azure HDInsight.

To write to Azure HDInsight, perform the following tasks:
Configure the Hadoop FS destination to use the HDP 2.4 stage library.
Configure Azure credentials.
You can configure the credentials in core-site.xml. For more information, see the Apache documentation: .
Or you can add the following Hadoop configuration property to the destination: fs.azure.account.key.<account name>.blob.core.windows.net
Use the appropriate account name, and set the property to the required access key.
In the destination, configure the Hadoop FS URI property using "wasbs" or "wasb" instead of "hdfs", as follows:wasbs://<URI>
